file_content.text: I'm looking for a girl named Kindra Gann.
Be welcome. Your pilgrimage was expected. But surprising.
Many disbelieved an outsider could enter. They preferred a symbolic interpretation.
May the Mystics see no shadows on you and the duty to all weigh lightly.
I'm not so good with the mushy stuff, so let me just say, he needs you home right away.
Oh, no! Is it mother? Devar promised he would tell me if... if....
Your mother is sick. Your brother wants you to return to Coruscant to see her.
Oh, no! I... I've been hoping that she'd get better. Like I did.
Your brother wants you back on Coruscant for your mother's funeral.
No! Mother! Devar promised he would tell me in time to see her again!
I--I must go right away. Um, that is, honored one, I humbly beg your permission to--
Even for we who serve, family is the foundation. Go in peace.
Oh, I hope I'm in time....
